      • dLdZsoftmax

        @Deprecated
public static INDArray dLdZsoftmax(INDArray dlda,
                                               INDArray a)
        Deprecated. No longer used
        Calculate dL/dz for softmax activation function, from dL/da and a, where
        a: output activations
        dL/da: derivative of loss function with respect to the output activations
        Note: This version does NOT modify either input arrays. This is less efficient. For a more efficient implementation that modifies the input arrays, use dLdZsoftmaxi(INDArray, INDArray).
        Parameters:
        dlda - derivative of loss function with respect to the output activations (shape [minibatchSize, nOut])
        a - output activations array (shape [minibatchSize, nOut])

      • dLdZsoftmaxi

        @Deprecated
public static INDArray dLdZsoftmaxi(INDArray dlda,
                                                INDArray a)
        Deprecated. No longer used
        Calculate dL/dz for softmax activation function, from dL/da and a, where
        a: output activations
        dL/da: derivative of loss function with respect to the output activations
        Note: This version WILL modify both input arrays (for efficiency). If this is not acceptable, use dLdZsoftmax(INDArray, INDArray).
        Parameters:
        dlda - derivative of loss function with respect to the output activations (shape [minibatchSize, nOut])
        a - output activations array (shape [minibatchSize, nOut])
